item.title: Foundation Stone Laid for 81-km Sindhanur–Raichur Railway Line – Hubli Express
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur, May 15: In a significant move to enhance transportation in Karnataka, the foundation stone for an 81 km railway line connecting Sindhanur and Raichur was laid today at the Sindhanur railway station. This project is a part of the Munirabad (Ginigera)–Raichur new railway line project.
Union Minister of State for Railways and Jal Shakti,V. Somanna, officially commenced the project by pressing a button, marking the beginning of construction.
Minister Somanna addressed the gathering, empha...]]>
item.author: Hubli Express, Read
